channel.title: Samples getting lost
channel.description:
Does anyone else have this problem?
I import my samples into Auxy in a specific Auxy folder, and somehow, over time, that folder in Auxy gets randomly deleted due to maybe a lost connection, and I have to import all of my samples back in Auxy all over again for my projects.

item.title: Samples getting lost
item.dc:creator: Kam
item.description:
Yup this happened to me 2 months ago I still don’t know why it happened.

Read full topic

item.title: Samples getting lost
item.dc:creator: Geovannitheson
item.description:
Interesting! I didn’t know Auxy could’ve picked up mp4 I guess I have to check it out

Read full topic

item.title: Samples getting lost
item.dc:creator: Osharu
item.description:
I can testify to this happening to me as well, and I don’t know why, but I think it has to do with the type of audio file the sample is? I seem to lose most of my .wav files, but for some reason, have kept all of my .mp4 files…

Read full topic
